alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 10:49PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nye and southeastern White Pine Counties through 1115 PM PDT... At 1048 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Preston to 6 miles southeast of Shoshone. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Brief moderate to heavy rain will lead to ponding on roadways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ely, Great Basin National Park, Preston, Baker, Lund, Shoshone, Connors Pass, Majors Place, Sacramento Pass and Cave Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
